inn1.comm: good length, angling across the right-hander from over the wicket, the line is a bit wide so the batsman can let it go
good length on a tight line just outside off, Rahane strides forward and shoulders arms once again
short of a length pitching outside off and angling away with decent bounce too, Rahane lets it go again. No deadly inswing into the right-hander yet for Starc
Rahane comes forward to one that's fuller and much straighter and dabs it close towards midwicket, a bit of hesitation while running between the wickets but India are away ...
Dhawan is beaten prodding half-heartedly at one that pitches outside off and held its line, he looked extremely iffy playing that
slightly wider outside off from Starc, so it's a bit easier for Dhawan to leave
Hazlewood's first ball from over the wicket is a poor one, full and down leg side, too far away for Rahane to glance, but he tries anyway
the second one is down the leg side too, not as far as the previous one but still wide enough for Rahane not to connect with the glance
three in a row down the leg side from Hazlewood, giving Haddin a real workout early in the day, Haddin makes a small appeal too but that wasn't close to the bat
he's bowled one on the off side! On a good length too, and Rahane lets it go
good length and straight, Rahane stays in his crease and blocks

an appeal for lbw from Hazlewood after he pitches on a great length outside off and nips the ball back into the right-hander, beating Rahane on the inside edge and hitting the top of the front pad. Too high, I think
wider outside the off stump, left alone
fuller and straighter, Rahane moves forward and pushes the ball towards mid-on

that's a ripper, pitched on a good length outside off after angling into the right-hander and seamed away off the pitch, Rahane began to poke at it of the front foot but sort of checked his shot as it moved away from him
some people in the crowd give Dhawan a cheer as he tucks a length ball off his hips behind square
Starc bowls it wide outside the off stump, Rahane plays no shot
Rahane presses forward to a fuller ball around middle and off and dabs on the leg side
and Rahane does got for his shots, flaying at a full ball outside off, he wanted to hit that over cover but the ball flew off the outside edge towards third man
a full ball angling into the left-hander, Dhawan moves forward and plays a checked drive to extra cover
short of a length with a little width outside off, Dhawan lets it go
Hazlewood begins his second over with a pinpoint yorker, Rahane does well to keep it out. Big improvement from the start of his first over
length ball outside off stump, Rahane lets it go
good length without much room for the right-hander, Rahane stays in his crease and blocks
strays on to the pads this time, Rahane flicks the ball down to long leg
that's rocketed to the square leg boundary! Rahane leaned across to a full ball on his pads and flicked it behind square with stupendous timing
good length just outside off stump, Rahane defends with a straight bat
Dhawan receives a full ball on his pads too, and his timing is not as good as he pushes it into the gap at midwicket
another one on his pads and Dhawan clips it through the leg side again, once again his timing is not awesome and the ball won't reach the boundary
Starc corrects his line to one that is just outside off, Dhawan lets the ball go
good length homing in on off stump from just outside, Dhawan meets the ball with a straight bat and punches on the off side
Dhawan's found the gap at cover with a firm front foot-drive. Starc's length was full outside off. Warner gives chase and gets to the ball really quickly
short of a length outside off, Dhawan sways out of the line to let the ball pass
a length ball on middle and leg, Rahane drops it with soft hands behind square and they run a quick single
another quick single taken after Dhawan defends a good length ball from middle and off on the off side
defended on the off side

that's just wide of the diving Brad Haddin! The ball was short and down leg side and Rahane swivelled and tried to pull. He got just a bit of bat on it, just enough to send the ball wide of Haddin's leap
defended from the crease
good length on off stump, Rahane moves forward and defends with a straight bat

Dhawan's gone. A replay of a dismissal we've seen so often this tour. Dhawan stayed rooted to his crease as the ball bounced a bit extra from a good length just outside off. He dabbed at it almost as if he was trying to give first slip catching practice. Finch took it too easily.
defends from the crease on the off side, he was slightly squared up as he did so
Rayudu stays in his crease and defend son the off side
Rayudu charges and then aborts playing a shot as Starc gets a ball to lift sharply and angle across the right-hander. A bit too wide outside off that was
another short ball, closer to the batsman, Rayudu sways out of the line
a full ball outside off, driven into the covers to get off the mark
wide outside the off stump, Rahane shoulders arms
a tight leave outside off, that pitched on a good length just outside off stump
hits a good length just outside off and angles into the right-hander, Hazlewood's getting the ball to move, Rayudu defends from his crease. He looked a bit hesitant
now he moves forward and across towards the off side and mows across the line. That's a slog and it does not go past midwicket
this one goes over the infield! Rayudu moves towards the off side, gets slightly forward and uses the angle into him to lift the full ball over mid-on
nudged on the leg side for a quick single
good call for a run, Rahane sprinted as soon as he pushed the ball into the covers off the front foot
good length on off stump, Rahane stays in his crease and defends on the off side
good length on off and middle, Rahane stays in his crease and dabs the ball close on the leg side for a single
goes deep into the crease to play the ball close on the leg side for one more
a fuller ball on the pads, turned behind square
a full ball on off and middle, Rayudu nearly yorked himself as he pushed the ball out to mid-on

oh my! Rayudu has charged down the pitch to a length ball and lofted it cleanly on the up and all the way over the long-on boundary. He simply picked up the length early and hit sweetly through the line
that short ball got big on Rahane but he managed to adjust and pull the ball down through midwicket
good length outside off, defended on the off side
that ball bounced sharply on Rahane from a good length, rapped him on the glove as he tried to defend on the back foot
defended from the crease on the off side
strays on to the pads, Rahane tucks it behind square for a single
Rayudu moves a little towards leg to create some room and then steers the ball towards third man
a length ball angling into the right-hander, played towards midwicket for a single
he was looking to play that towards square leg but closed the face too early and got a leading edge that went along the ground towards mid on
that's a loopy short ball that got too high on Rayudu, but he went after it and tried to ramp the ball over the cordon
jumps back and across to another short ball and plays it towards square leg
Rahane stays in his crease and gets a thick outside edge that takes the ball along the ground towards third man, he was trying to play that in front of point
Marsh bangs it in short again at Rayudu, and he sways out of the line
a fuller ball on middle and leg, Rayudu clips it through square leg for a single
defended on the front foot on the off side
bowled full and straight, driven back to the bowler
a lofted drive and it's just wide of Doherty's full length dive to his left, Rayudu went hard at the ball but then checked his shot to long off
that's down leg side, Rahane tries to sweep but doesn't make contact
nudged in front of square for a single
played close on the off side for a quick single
goes back to one that pitches outside off and punches in front of point
good length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, Rahane rides the bounce and opens the face to steer the ball behind point
short of a length at the body, cramping Rayudu for room, he dabs the ball close on the leg side and wants a single. Rahane says no
short ball just outside off at 135 kph, lots of time for Rayudu to use his bat like a ramp and chip it over the wicketkeeper
that's wide down leg side and Rayudu misses the flick, Haddin catches the ball and appeals. There was a sound but that was bat on pad

that is a sensational catch from Warner. Rayudu had charged and slashed at the ball, carving it high over the infield on the off side. Warner went after it from cover, I reckon. Running back as the ball swirled away from him but fast enough to get under it and judged it to perfection. He covered so much ground to get under that catch, and he makes a statement to the Indian fans giving him a hard time.
defended on the off side
pushed to long on for a single and Kohli's off the mark first ball
defended on the front foot on the leg side
worked through square leg for a single
pushed quickly through the air on middle stump, defended on the leg side
defended on the front foot on the off side
Kohli strides forward to defend on the off side
a good length ball on leg, Rahane misses the glance and gets hit on the thigh
driven firmly to the fielder at mid-off
short ball and Rahane gets on top of the bounce and rolls his wrists to pull the ball down to deep square leg
a fuller ball outside off stump, Rahane moves forward and plays a crisp drive to mid-off
a full ball on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on from the crease
nudged off the pads on the leg side
Kohli drives the ball back to Doherty
defended on the off side
Kohli moves forward to a slower, fuller ball and plays a wristy drive through cover
Rahane drives a full ball off the front foot past the diving Doherty towards long off
Kohli tries to cut but the ball is too close to him and he gets a bottom edge into the pitch near his feet. Looks like the ball hit the top of the bat handle actually
looked to defend but he gets an inside edge that goes towards fine leg
